name: Odda - The curse
description: Odda is a former samurai from Ini Kingdom, whose anger was always the reason of its fame. At the age of 17, Odda executed a samurai within the sacred grove, because of that he was cursed by Ini's King, to be exhiled. The curse of Odda prevents him to use any kind of sword until his last breath. He carries a Tant√µ so that at the time of his death, He is able to commit a harakiri/seppuku and overcome its curse. Since then, odda lived in the outskirts of the forbidden pass, where he learned to hunt and live among the animals and beings of the grove. Many believe that Odda is no longer a human being, and that the rage consumed him and turned him into a entity that haunts the woods.
